name: GNext sas di Simone Ligi & c.
goal: GNext is a SME that developed a technology to easily apply a thin film of graphene nanoplatelets to a wide range of materials e.g. polymers, ceramics, metals, etc.  GNext aim to develop and produce new products base on nanotecnologies.
euInitiatives: EU project NanomemC2 Funded under: H2020-EU.3.3.2. - Low-cost, low-carbon energy supply
